text: Chikara (力 or 主税) is a masculine Japanese given name. When written in most forms of kanji, the name means strength, power, authority and other similar variations. Notable people with the name include: *, Japanese professional shogi player *Chikara Mizuhata, Japanese racing driver, see 2010 D1 Grand Prix series *Chikara Nakashita, Japanese swimmer, competed at the 1997 Summer Universiade *, Japanese politician *, Japanese wrestler Category:Japanese masculine given names
title: Chikara (given name)
